member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.IsCi
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether Cake is running in a CI environment.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Config.EnvConfig.WorkingDirectory
member.summary: Gets or sets the working directory.

member.name: P:Cake.Tasks.Core.BasePipelineTaskAttribute.CiSystem
member.summary:
Gets or sets the name of the CI system in which this task can be executed (TFS, AppVeyor, etc.).
If not specified, this task will always be executed.

member.name: T:Cake.Tasks.Core.ConfigAttribute
member.summary: Marks a method as a configuration task.

member.name: T:Cake.Tasks.Core.TaskPluginAttribute
member.summary: Registers a class in the assembly that has task plugins.
